meta.title: Crazy Chat Overlay by AssistantApps
meta.description: This web page allows you to customize your chat overlay for use in Streamlabs or OBS browser source.

subtitle: No Man's Sky Adventures with
footerDescription: Feel free to subscribe to the channel and join us in a live stream or two!

headers.name: Content-Security-Policy
